data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cano, Eusebio, Musarella, Carmelo Maria, Cano-Ortiz, Ana, Fuentes, Jose Carlos Pinar, Spampinato, Giovanni, Gomes, Carlos Jose Pinto (2017): Morphometric analysis and bioclimatic distribution of Glebioniscoronaria s. l. (Asteraceae) in the Mediterranean area. PhytoKeys 81: 103-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.81.11995, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.81.11995
